titles: A letter to the D. of P in answer to the argueing part of his first letter to Mr. G[ooden].
author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Sergeant. cf. NUC pre-1956.
keywords: Gooden, Peter, d. 1695. --  Letter to Mr. G. giving a true account of a late conference.
